description: Aaron Michael Services provides professional installation of seamless flooring transitions between hardwood, tile, carpet, vinyl, and other surfaces. Ensuring safety, ADA compliance, and aesthetic continuity in Buffalo, Kenmore, Tonawanda, North Tonawanda, and Cheektowaga.

itemOffered.name: T-Molding Transition
itemOffered.description: Connects two floors of equal height like hardwood to laminate for a smooth, safe walkable surface.

itemOffered.name: Reducer Strip
itemOffered.description: Bridges floors of different heights like hardwood to vinyl, reducing trip hazards and protecting edges.

itemOffered.name: Carpet to Hard Surface Transition
itemOffered.description: Secure metal or vinyl edge strips for transitioning from carpet to tile or hardwood safely.

itemOffered.name: Thresholds
itemOffered.description: ADA-compliant doorway thresholds that maintain a low profile, safe passage, and aesthetic continuity.

itemOffered.name: Custom Flooring Transitions
itemOffered.description: Tailored solutions using wood, metal, or engineered materials to create smooth, safe, and visually appealing transitions.
